tess.conditions.thermostats.runtime20 module¶

class tess.conditions.thermostats.runtime20.Runtime20Condition(automation)[source]¶

Bases: tess.conditions.thermostats.ThermostatBaseCondition

This class is for running fan on for a certain time period every hour regardless of air quality sensor data. Blind random test to see if we can compare Fan runtime to Fan rule.

run()[source]¶
